gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
gemini_models.description: Google's most advanced reasoning model for highly complex tasks.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
gemini_models.description: A balanced model offering well-rounded capabilities and a strong price-performance ratio.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image
gemini_models.description: A variant of Flash 2.5 optimized for rapid image generation and conversational image editing.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite
gemini_models.description: Google's most cost-effective model, designed for high-throughput, low-latency tasks.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
gemini_models.description: An earlier multimodal model for general, everyday tasks.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite
gemini_models.description: An earlier cost-optimized version of 2.0 Flash.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 1.5 Pro
gemini_models.description: A powerful midsized multimodal model known for its large context window.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 1.5 Flash
gemini_models.description: An earlier smaller, faster version of 1.5 Pro.

gemini_models.name: Gemini 1.0 Ultra
gemini_models.description: The original Ultra model, designed for highly complex tasks (legacy).

gemini_models.name: Gemini 1.0 Pro
gemini_models.description: The original Pro model, designed for a wide range of tasks (legacy).

gemini_models.name: Gemini 1.0 Nano
gemini_models.description: The original Nano model, designed for efficient on-device tasks (legacy).

gemini_models.name: Gemini Nano
gemini_models.description: Models optimized for on-device applications, such as on the Pixel phone.
